biotools.summary: Automatically identify red blood cells and red blood cells infected with Plasmodium in a set of images. The software identifies cells using a circlular Hough transform, then looks for stained spots within cells as evidence of infection. Identified cells that are misshapen (debris on the slide) or have too much stain (white blood cells) are discarded.

bioschemas.name: Plasmodium Autocount
